articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Highway humor is officials’ new trick to encourage safer driving
articles.description: Iowa’s Department on Transportation started using clever one-liners to get drivers to slow down or stop texting, and it’s a trend that’s caught on across the country.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Why Fort Worth, Texas could be an example for cities trying to get healthy
articles.description: When Cynthia McFadden last visited Fort Worth in 2015, it was one of the unhealthiest cities in America. The mayor took inspiration from “Blue Zones” and has helped to transform the lives of many of her citizens.

articles.title: Coming together 50 years after growing up in segregated Birmingham
articles.description: The children who grew up in a segregated Birmingham, Alabama returned home to tell their stories together, making connections that were strictly forbidden when they were growing up.

articles.title: Isolated tribe kills U.S. missionary John Chau killed with bow and arrow
